website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight aluminum table-and-stool set is perfect for having pop-up picnics anywhere in the outdoors.
pros: The table folds up for easy carrying, and it also unfolds with simplicity -- it only takes a few quick motions
Stools are lightweight and sling right over your shoulder
The table also has two adjustable heights, which are at about 28 inches and 15 inches
cons: The table comes with only two stools, so if you require more than that for your family you would have to order extras

customer_reviews.title: Great table, short chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Easy to set up and take down. I use it for counter space outside of our travel trailer. My only complaint is the chairs. They are EXTREMELY short! Especially in comparison to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Kburling

customer_reviews.title: Nice size table
customer_reviews.text: Nice size table. Shipped quickly. I needed a 3 foot table to use with our sewing machine. This worked great and is sturdy. I would recommend this table to anyone, camper or not.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Weatherwax

customer_reviews.title: Compact, light weight, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what I was looking for! Compact, light weight, and super cute! Has a nice vintage look too. I bought it specifically to stow behind the seat in our camper. We can take it out quickly and easily set it up for a woodland dinner for two. It also comes with two cot-style seats. The price point was right where I wanted it too. ;) Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KelcyA

customer_reviews.title: easy set up and put away
customer_reviews.text: the table is great and easy to set up and take down. You can choose from two heights. Chairs are pretty much what you would expect from cap chairs. small and not real comfortable. Everything folds up, chairs go inside the folded table.I gave this to my daughter for Christmas because she has a really tiny apartment and a table she can fold up out of the way when not needed seemed ideal. We got it out to use during our Christmas celebration to play cards and board games in the living room. My other daughter became uncomfortable on the camp chair she was using, but was able to endure it for our games.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Great craft table
customer_reviews.text: Great pop up craft table. Easy to pop up. My huge self healing cutting mat fits well on the top. Note there is a seam bump in the middle but I have rotary cut curves right on top of it with no issue ( on the largest cutting mat of course). My big shot cutter (large one) has more than enough room on all sides for putting dies all around and having hand/arm space. I put a wood plank across the bottom side bars for make shift shelf to keep my big shot plus and dies on. All in all, great purchase. Light and easily foldable too
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Its a table that folds and looks like a shiny briefcase
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Its easy to travel with. The chairs are nice to have. Also, dont lean too much on the chair cuz it does bend a little... well i was using it on an uneven ground so thats why... and i was drinking a little ah nevermind that. You can just be d it back. Anyways i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, cute and practical.
customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly as described. There's a folding table that's easy to set up, and two little stools. Everything worked fine and the two stools fit inside the table when it's folded. I only used this once and was pleased. As for long-term quality, can't say yet.
customer_reviews.author: PittsburghRedhead

customer_reviews.title: pretty flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan of these tables. They are way too light weight and flimsy to hold anything other than paper plates and cups. Good for using as a kiddie table in outdoor bbq and picnics I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Chairs do not fit inside!
customer_reviews.text: The chairs do not fit inside the table as shown on the instructional video! There must have been some manufacturing changes. As you can see from the photo, the legs of the chair overlap the legs of the table from the inside. I was so excited for this table only to be let down when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Joer Chino Burgonio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table to set up for camping!
customer_reviews.text: I like this table I use it as a table to hold all my things while road tripping or camping. I just wish the chairs fit inside the table it might be user error or they sent me the wrong chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great little table, good value
customer_reviews.text: I love this little table. It is just the right size for misc events and food stuff. The dual height is good for high or low chairs. It folds up nicely and has a good handle. The ad here was really good with a lot of details and measurements. The little folding chairs are a nice addition, but they are as small as you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley I. George

customer_reviews.title: The perfect table for any occasion!
customer_reviews.text: The table is perfect! It folds up and is so convenient. Takes up such a small space. For camping it is a must. We used it at my daughters wedding. She married at a national park and we needed a small table and it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We loved it and asked where they had bought it and ...
customer_reviews.text: We were at an outdoor concert and the people picnicing next to us were setting up this table. We loved it and asked where they had bought it and what was the brand. They said they had got it on Amazon so we sat there and found it on Amazon and sent in our order! We love that it is lightweight and legs can be either short or extended. VERY HAPPY with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Moe

customer_reviews.title: Portability
customer_reviews.text: The table looks like the picture, easy to set up. And with the extention legs, it's high enough for easy cooking without bending over. Without extention, great for the beach. Only one problem, that is the chairs you get are only 14 inches tall, not 23 1/2 as described. So be prepared to look rediculos if used when table is at highest level.
customer_reviews.author: Rugratbg1

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying this product rated 5 stars and is a must-have if you want compact lightweight versatile table and chairs for when you're hiking or camping or using around the house, the sturdiness of the table itself is good but just received the unit and haven't really put it through any intense runs but looking forward to it, shipping was quick, unit was as described, and seems to be made out of materials that will last, much better and some of the products you find out there nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tiedeman

customer_reviews.title: Great small table
customer_reviews.text: I used this table for the first time on Saturday at a neighborhood canvassing event. I was able to place 5 folders on the table- all not touching- plus an additional paper. We didn't use the little stools, but found the S hooks handy to hang a couple of bags. All in all a great sturdy attractive table and VERY easy to assemble and disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Ellenms

customer_reviews.title: This foldable table is amazing! Easy to install and carry
customer_reviews.text: This foldable table is amazing! Easy to install and carry. I love the two foldable chairs. They are so comfortable. The table kit is very light to carry around. This is a wonderful table and chairs for outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product- easy to operate, light weight, good price
customer_reviews.text: The table was much easier to open and close than I thought. Took 3 minutes to put together. One reviewer said he/she got pinched while unfolding it. I think you might get pinched if you pushed on the joint rather than the stem. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: onwingsofsong

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stable compact folding table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to support a 21 lb. attache case filled with amateur radio equipment for use while on vacation. I wasn't completely assured of the sturdiness of the table when I ordered it, but now, upon receipt, I see that the table is quite strong and stable enough for my needs. It folds up nicely to a compact size, and it even includes two little folding chairs, which, while small, do support my 200 lb. bulk. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Camping Table and Stools!
customer_reviews.text: This compact, sturdy table is the perfect addition to our camping setup! The stools are tiny, but even my 6'7" tall 220lb boyfriend can sit comfortably on them. I highly reccommend this to anyone looking for a table for campsite, or even inside a large tent (which is where mine will go!).
customer_reviews.author: Virginia A.

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty big . It’s light and easy to assemble I kinda don’t like the chairs 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Diana Franco

customer_reviews.title: A level table in a snap!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my 13’ Scamp travel trailer. It’s small, the trailer, so I wanted something lightweight, compact, and easy to use. This table fits the bill. It is a snap to put together, has leveling adjustable legs, two nice chairs and is equally as easy to fold back up. It’s a great little table for outside the camper to sit and have coffee at or play cards on.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: solidly built,easy to use
customer_reviews.text: works well, solid, put the table together in less then a minute,nice that everything for table stores inside table.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wutka

customer_reviews.title: I definitely like this little table
customer_reviews.text: I definitely like this little table! Easy to assemble, pack, and store away. The only down fall is the tiny, tiny stools. I understand they have to be that way in order to fit inside the belly of the table. It was nice to take camping. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Compact enough to fit in luggage
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to take on a medical relief trip to the slums of Nairobi, Kenya. They were light and fit in our luggage. They allowed us a workspace while working in the slums and were invaluable. Easy to set up and break down. Sturdy and dependable. We left the ones we bought there for our next trip, but plan on buying more to take.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little table.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, light weight, easy to assemble, great little table. Portable, & Perfect for a small patio!
customer_reviews.author: Kee

customer_reviews.title: Leg extensions detach & store in plastic clamps
customer_reviews.text: Great table, arrived on time, compact, sturdy, & sets up quickly. Not so sure about the tiny stools, but they were a bonus as I did not realize it came with stools.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY

customer_reviews.title: Height and size
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Perfect size for studying on and perfect height. Very easy to carry around, take down, lightweight. Just what I wanted. I can take the table outside and study with no trouble carrying. I’m in love with the table.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Borowiak

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.  so easy to transport, raise or lower.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. I ordered this for a kids room so it can rise higher as they do (or fold an move around the house or take on the go. This is going on the practical gift to give.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than expected at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a printer in the home office in an apartment I live it while on a job. The table folds up easily and the printer doesn't wobble much. I reinforce it with a shredder at one of the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk J. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Table is perfect for camping. Will use chairs for foot rest,very small. What are the screws for? No explanation anywhere. (“S” hooks are used near handles to hang items)
customer_reviews.author: Laura K

customer_reviews.title: Nice little table, sturdy and light
customer_reviews.text: Table was very light. We immediately test assembled it and it was pretty sturdy. A nice addition to our RV, probably use it to place the portable grill onto.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Works great for car camping
customer_reviews.text: great table and conveniently stores chairs inside to save space, only thing I would change would be to add levelers to all the legs since when your outdoors the ground isn't always level.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lipps

customer_reviews.title: The folding chair does not fit!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this table set. The box comes with the table, and the 2 folding stools were packed outside of the table. Per the product video, the chairs should fit inside the table, but they do not. They are too big! Make me wonder if they habe shipped the wrong set to me in the box. I am saddly needing to return this.
customer_reviews.author: W.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great table abs easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Great grab and go table. Love how it can be different heights. Perfect for putting together legos. Like how the little sling chairs fit inside for easy storage and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. It's big enough to hold my two burner Coleman stove with room for everything I'm cooking. Its sturdy and height adjustment is great. Plenty of value here
customer_reviews.author: Ted O.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Ass!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap assed Chinese crap. Amazon has no standards. Table was so cheesy it didn't survive shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Oury

customer_reviews.title: Love this little table---- use it for crafts
customer_reviews.text: Love this little table---- use it for crafts, it is the perfect height, depth, and width for what I needed.. The chairs I use for sitting while pulling weeds and low pruning.
customer_reviews.author: JANET HAROLDSON

customer_reviews.title: wonderful set!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful easy to set up table and comfortable stools! The shortened version works great for my grandchildren to do artwork on. The heightened version is wonderful for my camping trip’s inside my van as a worktable an outside as well. Very pleased with the ease of setting it up and taking it now. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: nanita

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, we use it a lot during picnicking, it's easy to open and close, it has good quality, nice design, everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Good lil table easy to Store away takes up hardly any room the chairs are sturdy an well made
customer_reviews.author: Teah

customer_reviews.title: Good extra table for camping
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little table to take camping, nice and lightweight. Because it’s aluminum, it not the sturdiest, but it does the job at the campsite.
customer_reviews.author: April Amundson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic table. Sturdy and easy to set up. Bought it because of positive reviews. Glad it was well packed because carton has been pierced but no damage to table.
customer_reviews.author: p fen

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now ordered three of these tables for myself plus daughters. We are all enjoying them and find them easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Great little table. I bought this to bbq on and it is perfect! The two chairs that come with iy are handy and look to be pretty sturdy and well built. Plus they throw in a cool little survival tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T

customer_reviews.title: Portability
customer_reviews.text: Nice portable table👍🏾. Not recommended if you are overweight though
customer_reviews.author: ken brown

customer_reviews.title: Compact efficiency
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light, very compact table. I love that there are two height options. The included folding stools are great for extra guests, or to use as foot rests with our own bigger camping chairs. The table provides ample surface space but still folds compactly for travel--we love it! What a great way to class up our picnics/camping/tailgating.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Noore

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic table
customer_reviews.text: Used the table and chairs over the weekend on a hunt trip and both worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: David Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Great extra work space, short stools
customer_reviews.text: The table is the perfect size to add prep space for a tiny kitchen. Just exactly what my mom needed. The stools however are only the height of the table before the leg extensions are added. That was the only disappointment. The table folds nicely and stores next to moms refrigerator. Very convenient and she says sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Love Table, Stools Useless
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of this folding table. I use it all the time camping. Stools are useless and will barely hold a child. I gave those away.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ann Jaffarian

customer_reviews.title: lightwight but handle pull out easily
customer_reviews.text: as photo, when taking out from box, one handle just pull out, then how is portable? A scratch area on surface cornor, not sure if it's used. Did not even assemple it.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: Bad stools
customer_reviews.text: The table.is great, but the stools are so small, even when u sit on one, u are too low. They are a child size stool
customer_reviews.author: Candy Mtz

customer_reviews.title: Great little camping table!
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I was expecting, which is a great little compact and lightweight table for camping. Quick to set up and take down. Love the tiny little stools and how they store inside the table. It won’t handle any table dancing, but does the job I need it to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight packable and retro
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight and the retro looking top. I am looking forward to using this in our 1976 Airstream as a dining table and card table.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gilmer-vandorp

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, also that it folds up. We travel and I still work - it is great as a desk
customer_reviews.author: sheila wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great until outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for indoor and outdoor use and it got rained on for 20 min and bubbled up..loved this table up until it did not hold up outside.
customer_reviews.author: kathaleen kelley

customer_reviews.title: table for two ...nice size
customer_reviews.text: Nice little table..Perfect for camping. .seems sturdy..but just got it so haven't used it yet
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is perfect! It meets the need that I bought it for. It’s light for it’s size and it is well made. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The table is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: We just received our table and it’s perfect! We have a travel trailer and the table is perfect for BBQing and providing extra table space. The two camp chairs are compact but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: It's flimsy... not very stable and uses cheap materials for it's construction. It arrived quick and sound, that's practically why the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Moisés CD Marcón Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Very lightweight and compact. Love how the camp stools fit inside the folded up table for easy storage. Will be using this on camping trips. Perfect size for two people
customer_reviews.author: pat hansen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for arts and crafts with the kids and we are done, just fold it up and put away
customer_reviews.author: rosemary normoyle

customer_reviews.title: I love my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This folding table is very easy to set up and does not take up much space at all. It is lightweight and also comes with 2 chairs. Very easy to clean up. I love this purchase and would recommmend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for doing my diamond paintings. It doesn't have a middle height. Other than that. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetthing1961

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry and endlessly useful this was a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this folding table and stool set! Compact, easy to carry and endlessly useful this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Winterbone

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and store!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table for outside of our vintage camper. We love it! We can put stuff on it as we’re going in and out of the camper and we can use the little chairs to put things on while we’re sitting by the fire!
customer_reviews.author: patrick sharp

customer_reviews.title: stools are a little short
customer_reviews.text: stools are a little short for the table height for kids. But otherwise, we are quite happy!
customer_reviews.author: Seyward Rittberger

customer_reviews.title: The fact that it is very portable is very nice. The leg extensions let you customize how you ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light and convenient. The fact that it is very portable is very nice. The leg extensions let you customize how you want to place it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Iguban

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camping or trade table
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Lightweight. Good design and fits a double burner and much more.
customer_reviews.author: RBarsomE

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The table seems very sturdy, and folds up nicely. I like how the chairs fit underneath snugly and snap in easily.
customer_reviews.author: C. R.

customer_reviews.title: Ok deal not great
customer_reviews.text: The stools bent almost immediately and are useless. The table seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is compact and portable and the perfect size that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Slomotion

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: I love the table, it's exactly what I needed. It's sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Just enough room for camp grill and prep area.
customer_reviews.text: I love how small it folds up to. Easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Use it as my station for makeup jobs. It is lightweight, easy, and so fast to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Nic G

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: What a great little set. I use this table for overlanding. It light and folds up to a small package. Great for kids also. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect folding table for camping. Compact size stores great in rv
customer_reviews.author: Allison Kangas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The table is pretty wobbly, my husband made extra supports for the legs and it works great now.
customer_reviews.author: VGrubb

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set up, good table
customer_reviews.text: I like the table so far, it is very easy to set up and very easy to use. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Portable, sturdy, endless uses
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent table; rigid and portable! This is also great as a small hobby/project desk too!!
customer_reviews.author: Louis

product_meta.title: REDCAMP Folding Camping Table Adjustable, Portable Picnic Table with 2 Chairs, Aluminum White 35.4"x23.6"x15''/27.6"
product_meta.description: Enjoy your indoor and outdoor entertainments with Redcamp aluminum folding picnic table. High Quality & Considerate Details Redcamp 4-foot adjustable folding tables are constructed of medium density fiberboard and aluminum alloy frame. They will not crack, chip or peel. Security latch help the tabletop keep steady when setup, impact-resistant design of round corner on the tabletop ensures safety, triangle locking hinge add more support to ensure the stability. Adjustable foot caps provide balance even on unflat floor. Easy Carrying Compact and small when folded, with portable handle you can carrying this lightweight aluminum camping table without too much strength. Go anywhere you want at any time with this multi-purpose tables with folding stools Great for all activities 2 height available with detachable legs for different needs. Water-proof, stain-resistant, served as a 4 -season camping table, suitable for picnics, beaches, parties, fishing, camping, hiking, outdoor concerts, & more About REDCAMP REDCAMP is a professional outdoor equipment brand. We adhering to the "Enjoy ur tour, Enjoy ur dream." as the design concept, we design and develop the high quality outdoor gears to provide you a favorite outdoor experiences in the nature. The REDCAMP Character: Higher Quality Customers First Our goal is to provide higher quality products with premium, unique features. All of our gears are thoughtfully designed and tested to exceed your expectation and we love to hear back from our customers about their user experience. Trust us, Trust yourself.
feature_bullets: ★2 ADJUSTABLE HEIGHTS: This 3 foot folding table size is 48 x 24 inches, heights can be adjusted to 15 and 28 inches with the adjustable legs. The pack size is 24x18x3 inches when folded in half.

★STURDY AND STABLE: Tabletop thickness is 1.5 inches. Table leg tubes diameter 25mm. Finished with extra U shape side support and secure latch in the corner, ensures the fold up table sturdy enough in use. The stools have been updated till the height of 15 inches, which is 2 inches higher than before

★COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT: The total weight of foldable table and chairs set is less than 20lbs. But the aluminum table can hold up to 70lbs weight capacity, and the chairs hold up to 180lbs. Perfect heavy duty portable table for camping trip.
★EASY TO SET AND FOLD: Set up the picnic table and chairs easily within several seconds. Quick to fold them together and take with the carry handle. Easy to clean the tabletop with a paper.

★MULTI-PURPOSE:The portable folding table and chairs set can be used as picnic table for outdoor, grill side table for outside BBQ, serving table for dining, small patio table for adult and kids, metal camping table for beach, fishing, concert, sport events.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars145 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
